interface.name: treeland_personalization_manager_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows a client to customized display effects.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.

request.name: get_window_context
request.description: set window background, shadow based on context

interface.name: personalization_wallpaper_context_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows a client personalization wallpaper.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.

description.summary: set the current user's wallpaper fd

entry.name: preview
entry.summary: whether to show a preview of the picture

description.summary: Set whether the current wallpaper is dark

event.name: metadata
event.description: Send this signal after getting the user's wallpaper.

interface.name: personalization_cursor_context_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows a client personalization cursor.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.

request.name: commit
request.description: if only one commit fails validation, the commit will fail

event.name: verfity
event.description: Send this signal after commit cursor configure.

arg.name: success
arg.summary: check whether the configuration is successful

event.name: theme
event.description: Send this signal after system cursor theme changed.

event.name: size
event.description: Send this signal after system cursor size changed.

interface.name: personalization_window_context_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows a client personalization window.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.

enum.name: blend_mode
enum.description: Window blend mode defines how compositor composite window's surface over other surfaces.

entry.name: transparent
entry.summary: Normal blend mode, just composite over background with alpha channel

entry.name: blur
entry.summary: Blur the content of the window background

request.name: set_round_corner_radius
request.description: This request will set window round corner radius, invoking this request means user want to manage window round corner radius by itself. If not invoked, window round corner radius will be decided by compositor.

request.name: set_shadow
request.description: Set window shadow's radius, offset and color, invoking this request indicates that client want to manage the window shadow by itself. If not invoked, window shadow will be decided by the compositor

request.name: set_border
request.description: Set window border width and color

request.name: set_resizable
request.description: Set if this window can be resized by system

request.name: set_movable

description.summary: set if this window can be moved by system

request.description: Set if this window can be moved by system

request.name: set_no_titlebar

description.summary: set if system titlebar is enabled

request.description: Set if system titlebar is enabled
